title: Simplify navigation to Home, About Us, and Get in Touch; Instagram-only footer

requirements.summary: Remove Portfolio/Our Work, Pricing, and Packages sections so only Home, About Us, and Get in Touch remain visible.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` no longer imports or renders `PortfolioSection`, `PricingSection`, or `PackagesSection`.
The page no longer shows any Portfolio/Our Work gallery UI, Pricing tiers UI, or Packages/Package Details accordion UI.
The Contact/Get in Touch section remains visible and functional.

file_operations.description: Remove imports and rendered instances of PortfolioSection, PricingSection, and PackagesSection so the page only composes HomeSection, AboutSection, ContactSection, and Footer.

requirements.summary: Update the top navigation to only include Home and About Us plus the existing Get in Touch call-to-action.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx` no longer renders nav items for `portfolio`, `pricing`, or `packages` in desktop or mobile menus.
NavBar has working navigation for Home (`#home`) and About Us (`#about`), and the Get in Touch button scrolls to `#contact` on both desktop and mobile.

file_operations.description: Update the navLinks list and any related rendering so only Home (#home) and About Us (#about) links remain in both desktop and mobile menus; keep Get in Touch CTA scrolling to #contact. (Do not edit anything under frontend/src/components/ui.)

requirements.summary: Update the Home hero buttons so none scroll to the removed Portfolio/Our Work section.
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons shown in the Home hero scroll to sections that still exist (e.g., About Us and/or Get in Touch) and do not produce errors in the console when clicked.

file_operations.description: Replace the hero CTA that scrolls to 'portfolio' with a CTA that scrolls to an existing section (e.g., 'about' and/or 'contact'); ensure no scrollToSection('portfolio') call remains and button clicks do not error.

requirements.summary: Simplify the footer to remove Quick Links and Contact sections and keep only a single Instagram link in Follow Us.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx` no longer renders the Quick Links list and no longer renders any Contact details (email/phone/address).

The Follow Us section includes exactly one social link: Instagram, pointing to `https://www.instagram.com/thestoriesbehindvows?igsh=bWdrN3o1M21meDBn`, opening in a new tab (`target="_blank"`) with `rel="noopener noreferrer"`.
No Facebook or X links/icons are shown in the footer.
Footer layout remains visually consistent (no empty columns or obvious spacing gaps).

file_operations.description: Remove Quick Links and Contact Info blocks entirely; update layout to avoid empty columns; keep a Follow Us area with exactly one Instagram link to https://www.instagram.com/thestoriesbehindvows?igsh=bWdrN3o1M21meDBn using target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer"; remove any Facebook/X icons/links and unused icon imports.
